text: Ned chɨl nopul, tap teplep ogɨnap gɨpek. Anɨb ak tek, ñɨn anɨb ak tɨkɨl gɨ dad apɨl mɨñɨl owup, chɨl nɨbop nen God nop pel agnopul. Pen anɨgɨl agnopul, God Kawnan ak nɨbop gos tep yɨbɨl ñɨnɨmuŋ. Ñek, nɨbi binɨb gos nɨgep sek mɨdɨl gos nɨgtep gɨnɨgabɨm. Gos nɨgtep gɨl, God chɨnop nɨgek nop tep gonɨmuŋ anɨb nep gɨnɨgun agɨl, gos nɨgtep gɨnɨgabɨm. Pen nop agnopul, Nɨbop gos tep anɨb ak ñek, God gɨtep gep ne ak nɨgtep gɨnɨgabɨm. Nɨgtep gɨl nɨm, Bɨawl anop tep gɨnɨgab adek ak gem amnɨgab. Pen wog keke gɨtep gem amnɨgab.
